column4: so i can't access yahoo mail with any of my browsers. i can get to my inbox, but the emails won't open.  any suggestions? (Opera, FF, Epihany - Breezy)
I use ftechyahoo to let me use Evolution
no idea what ftechyahoo or evolution is
Evolution certainly is, but I found that Dapper's fetchyahoo stopped working recently, but the latest version from fetchyahoo.sourceforge.net works
